query:
INSERT INTO blogPosts (title, slug, excerpt, content, category, tags, authorId, authorName, authorCredentials, readTime, viewCount, isPublished, publishedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ('The Future of Adaptive Radiation Therapy: AI and Machine Learning Integration', 'future-adaptive-radiation-therapy-ai-ml', 'Exploring how artificial intelligence and machine learning are transforming adaptive radiation therapy workflows and enabling personalized cancer treatment.', '# The Future of Adaptive Radiation Therapy

Adaptive radiation therapy represents one of the most promising frontiers in precision oncology. AI and ML integration is transforming ART from resource-intensive to routine.

## AI-Enabled Workflows

- Automated anatomy segmentation
- Intelligent adaptation triggers
- Automated plan generation
- Real-time quality assurance

## Clinical Applications

- Head and neck cancer
- Prostate cancer
- Lung cancer
- MR-guided adaptive therapy

## Conclusion

AI-enabled ART represents a paradigm shift in precision oncology, transforming resource-intensive specialty applications into routine radiation therapy.', 'technology', 'adaptive radiation therapy, AI, machine learning, MR-guided RT', 1, 'Dr. Jennifer Park', 'MD, PhD', 12, 0, 1, '2025-01-20', NOW(), NOW())
